Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory28.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Who are you... And why do you know me?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hey, Watanabe! Long time no see!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'We trained together for a while in the beginning and Watanabe was in our group.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Did you forget that too?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It doesn't matter, I'm glad to cut all ties with you Babylonians.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You guys should be glad that it's just me here, if it were my comrades, they'd have cut you into pieces by now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No need to be so surprised, missy.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'If you knew what those people up in Babylonia did to us soldiers of the past...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg408_1.jpg'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'According to historical records, during the big evacuation, the World Government at that time did abandon some Ground Forces...'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'These troops cut their connections with Babylonia, and only recently surfaced again as the "Forsaken".'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'And you, Mr. Watanabe, chose to join their forces as a Construct from Babylonia... and was listed as a defected Construct...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory28.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You know a lot, little girl... You must be their most advanced Support Construct.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Looks like being able to see you with my own eyes means I didn't let you guys go in vain.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Stay away from Liv.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Lucia, is this your new commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe tries to step forward, but Lee raises his gun and points the barrel at Watanabe's head."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You once helped me out, Lucia. Even though it was trivial...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "However, I still want to express my gratitude. That way, I won't be in debt to either of you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Here, it's a gift.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe takes out a white box and hands it over.'}
{3: 'Watanabe insists on handing over the box.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This is a specialty of this desert area, an unnamed wild mint.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe starts chewing on a mint leaf.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We have it as a snack or to make tea... Sure beats the heat walking in the desert.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Sure smells strong... The commandant looks a bit more awake just by smelling it, hehe.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'See what I mean?', 4: '1'}
